at.ac.tuwien.ims.latex2mobiformulaconv.converter.mathml2html

Class FormulaConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.ims.latex2mobiformulaconv.converter.mathml2html.FormulaConverter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DOMFormulaConverter, ImageFormulaConverter

    public abstract class FormulaConverter
extends Object
    This abstract class provides shared routines for implementing formula converters. Provides mechanisms for finding, replacing and parsing formulas from the resulting file generated by Pandoc
    Author:
    Michael Au√ü Date: 08.06.14
    See Also:
    PandocLatexToHtmlConverter

        public abstract Formula parse(int id,
            String latexFormula)
        Parse latex formula code to entities, which afterward can be rendered to html
        Parameters:
        latexFormula -
        Returns:
        Parsed Formula root object, tree-like representation of formula for further html rendering

      • parseToMathML

        public Formula parseToMathML(int id,
                    String latexFormula)
        Parses a latex formula to MathML with SnuggleTeX
        Parameters:
        id - the formula's index
        latexFormula - the latex formula string
        Returns:
        formula object with set id, latex and mathml parameters

      • extractFormulas

        public Map<Integer,String> extractFormulas(org.jdom2.Document document)
        Parses a JDOM HTML Document for formula entries, sets an id to refer to it in the future.
        Parameters:
        document - JDOM HTML Document to parse
        Returns:
        Map of formulas, keys: given id, values: corresponding latex formula code from the document

      • replaceFormulas

        public org.jdom2.Document replaceFormulas(org.jdom2.Document doc,
                                 Map<Integer,Formula> formulaMap)
        Replaces all formulas with the html representation of the mapped formula objects
        Parameters:
        doc - JDOM Document where to replace the formulas
        formulaMap - Map of the indexed Formula Objects
        Returns:
        JDOM Document with replaced formulas
